commit.title: 2.0.1 version bump
queue widgets and ads JS during init action if requiring widget is active
use REST API descriptors for post meta in WP 4.6+. Update URL shortener length. fix post meta delete on empty fields
version bump 2.0.0
accept a Twitter.com widget settings URL as a passed widget ID in array builder
extract widget ID from Twitter widget settings URL
describe a widgets screenshot
describe 2.0 features for developers
move Moment outside of Timelines directory. inherit from Collection grid
always set a theme for a search widget
update readme to describe 2.0 features
Timelines: do not output ARIA polite values when limit set
Twitter Advertising: validate website tag ID
embedded search timeline: widget ID required
Merge pull request #17 from twitter/search-timeline
add an embedded search widget via shortcode or widget
add advertising tracker as widget
remove width and height property tests. add alt text
Twitter Cards: remove width and height from output meta elements. no longer used by Twitter Cards
Merge pull request #16 from twitter/ads-uwt
update conversion tracker to universal website tag
WordPress 4.7: describe Twitter Cards site username for REST API
add interface for timeline WordPress widgets
version 2.0 changelog
Merge pull request #14 from twitter/timelines-oembed
PSR style spacing
tests pass PHP5 mocked trait and abstract class restrictions
embed a profile timeline, list timeline, or collection by URL, shortcode, or widget
phpDoc cleanup
note pre-escaped markup for code sniffer
Admin: use underscores, not dashes, for section and help tab. code sniffer cleanup
add missing phpDoc param. PSR style method brackets on new line
move related intent pieces into a trait
use GLOBALS array over global variable when building HTTP User-Agent
PSR spacing fixes. add string method return type in phpDoc
separate screen name validator into distinct validation components for reuse
JS loaders: use wp_json_encode, requiring 4.1. add code sniffer ignore rule for output already escaped elsewhere
PSR formatting for autoload and boostrap tests
use spaces and other PSR formatting standards for autoloader
bump minimum WordPress to 4.1
update SingleImage test for returned array, not empty string
fix intermediate size handler
Cards: provide image alt text when available
tested up to 4.7. update Travis to newer versions of WordPress, PHP
single Tweet with video: remove status / hide tweet tests
Tests: fix protected method access and invocation
single Tweet with video: remove status customization. no longer supported
tested up to 4.6
Buttons: if a widget specifies no username use the stored value for the current author
cleanup. buttons into their own folder. update namespaces to match
WordPress 4.6: use wp_resource_hints for DNS prefetch when available
test for mb_strtolower before use
use publish.twitter.com oEmbed endpoint for single Tweet. update Moment and collection grid to improve compatibility with WordPress 4.5 embed support
tested up to WordPress 4.5
WP Core 4.5: use add_menu_page with null position instead of deprecated add_utility_page
show embeds in the third screenshot
describe v1.4
Tweet button: remove share count options
tested up to 4.4
enable language packs
always describe Periscope username string for translation
Follow button: more specific profile URL matching
Periscope On Air text change: use Periscope On Air Button instead of Periscope On Air for widget and Shortcode UI titles. describe Tweet Grid for translators
update postbox heading levels for WordPress 4.4
display a Follow button when a Twitter profile URL appears on its own line within content
update version string
improve description of table header gettext
remove WP Core oEmbed capable links from readme: not shown in plugin listing. fix link markup typo.
describe v1.3
test against PHP 7
reference classname instead of late static binding in defined check. limit supported oEmbed response types
describe new embedded Tweets grid template and Vine embeds
embed a single Vine by URL or using vine shortcode
add Tweet grid shortcode. displays multiple Tweets in a responsive grid template for a Twitter collection URL or twitter_grid shortcode
JavaScript loader: separate async JavaScript loading functionality of widgets-js loader into an abstract class
add DNS prefetch resource hint if widgets-js enqueued
disable plugin features by acting on the twitter_features filter
readme: style periscope_on_air shortcode macro in monospace
Shortcode UI: use new register_shortcode_ui action introduced in Shortcake 0.5
describe Moments and Periscope On Air features. note 1.2.0 as the current release version
display a Periscope On Air widget when a Periscope profile URL is included in post content
Periscope On Air widget and shortcode
escape Shortcake labels
add Greek and Ukrainian as supported Twitter widget languages
embed a Twitter Moment
always load ad tracking JS over HTTPS
fix: open and close table HTML for Twitter Cards in post edit screen independent from rows within
add latest WordPress versions as Travis CI environments
tested up to 4.3
use h1 for settings header
describe 1.1.0
Merge pull request #10 from twitter/shortcake
include async inline JS loader when generating shortcode markup while doing ajax. support shortcake shortcode UI if shortcake plugin installed
Merge pull request #9 from twitter/remove-cards
remove photo, product, and gallery cards. fixes #8
tested up to 4.2
Twitter Cards: output src structured property as the parent property for improved compatibility
performance improvement: use reset, not array_shift, to retrieve the first element in an array
make compatibility notice dismissable in WordPress 4.2+
standard Twitter Cards supported by the plugin no longer require approval
describe v1.0.1
clean up settings sections. load directly from SinglePage. fold a trait into the only implementing class. add an interface for sections
support setting via from the twitter_share shortcode
do not add Tweet button(s) to content when called inside the get_the_excerpt filter. change default priority to 15
fix mismatched HTML element in post meta box
simple PHP version for matching. strip everything other than major.minor.release
save a Follow button widget with default display options
display compatibility warning and deactivate if PHP version less than 5.4. fixes #6
note PHP 5.4 requirement in plugin short description fields. remove trailing slash from languages directory loader. do not echo tests dir in PHPUnit bootstrap
update PHPUnit bootstrap. locate tests dir based on WP_DEVELOP_DIR
update Travis CI. add PHP nightly as a separate allowed failure
composer update
add Travis CI image
initial commit

issues.title: Three feature requests: user-specified font, no URL, hypertext links to users/hashtags
How to disable media in list mode?
Autosaved widget may reject save attempt too early
Support expanded settings API in WP 4.7
Remove URL handler for follow button
Remove photo, product, and gallery cards
Display a notice to site administrators if plugin does not meet minimum PHP requirements
